IRpropMinusPower Class Reference

This class offers methods for the usage of the improved Resilient-Backpropagation-algorithm without weight-backtracking enhanced with Power. More...

#include <EnhancedRprop.h>

Detailed Description

This class offers methods for the usage of the improved Resilient-Backpropagation-algorithm without weight-backtracking enhanced with Power.

Definition at line 390 of file EnhancedRprop.h.

void IRpropMinusPower::initRprop ( double  _delta0 = 0.0000000001  )  [inline]

Prepares the Rprop algorithm for the currently used network.

Internal variables of the class instance are initialized and memory for used structures adapted to the used network. An initial value for the parameter is assigned to all weights of the network.

Parameters:
_delta0 Initial value for the parameter . The default value is "0.01".
Returns:
none
Author:
B. Mersch, C. Igel
Date:
2004
Changes
none
Status
stable

Definition at line 278 of file EnhancedRprop.h.

void IRpropMinusPower::rprop ( const Array< double > &  in,
const Array< double > &  out,
double  np = 1.05,
double  nm = .5,
double  dMax = 1,
double  dMin = 1e-6 
) [inline]

Performs iteration of the Rprop algorithm.

The error of the used network for the current iteration is calculated and the values of the weights and the parameters are adapted depending on this error.

Author:
B. Mersch, C. Igel
Date:
2004
Changes

Status
